name: Curios Labs Limited
description: Operator of a news platform intended to transform news and publications into audio journalism. The company's platform personalizes the curated articles according to the users' interests from various global publications that are narrated by professional voice actors, enabling users to listen to the news offline and stay updated with current affairs.
one_liner: Operator of a news platform intended to transform news and publications into audio journalism. The company's platform personalizes the curated articles according to the users' interests from various global publications that are narrated by professional voice actors, enabling users to listen to the news offline and stay updated with current affairs.
